Trustee_5_pre_4.name: James Wang
Trustee_5_pre_4.content: I have successfully executed the proposed allocation plan, demonstrating my commitment to transparency and fairness in the investment process. My consistent performance in distributing profits as agreed reinforces my reputation for reliability and precise execution. Overall, I am viewed as a strategic and disciplined trustee who prioritizes trustworthiness, which positively impacts my standing in the investment community.

Investor_5_pre_8.name: James Wang
Investor_5_pre_8.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated strategic and disciplined behavior, effectively negotiating a favorable profit-sharing plan. My actions were characterized by attentiveness to the processes and clear communication of expectations, which reinforces my reputation as a self-reliant investor focused on long-term gains. I have established a robust approach to investing that emphasizes analytical decision-making and engagement with trustees.
